workflow.description: ==PO approval flow== Approval levels are defined in the Approval Rules and as per the rules approval will be routed to specific person. Delegation approval has also included. Approval trial will be maintained.
workflow.name: Nappjo | Purchase Order Approval

initcondition.formula: "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND isChecked("Workflow:Approver Available?") = 'T'

"Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND isChecked("Workflow:Rejected?") = 'T' AND isChecked("Workflow:Approver Available?") = 'T' AND ( "User" IN ("PO Buyer") OR "User" IN ("Employee") OR "User Role" IN ("Role1") )
"User Role" IN ("Role1") OR "User" IN ("Employee") OR "User" IN ("PO Buyer")
